title: HELP!!! cant seem to to download the client on to my laptop
body: Hey guys, just recently got a laptop off a friend for studies at University and my first thought was to download league and start tearing that shit up, so i downloaded the client off the league of legends website as many of you guys have done countless of times but unfortunately when I've gone to install the program by clicking on the finished download tab a little blank box will flash in the middle of the screen for split second and make a error sound. after this nothing will happen, how can i fix this issue or what should i do so i can get back on and start grinding the league out again thanks.

replies.body: What Operating System is this laptop running? Windows, macOS, Linux?
